room_title: Escape room "Criminal Mystery" by Storm Out in Miami
room_address: 664 E Hallandale Beach Blvd, Hallandale Beach, FL 33009
room_description:
Your neighborhood has been quiet and friendly for many years until a strange man moved in next door.
You only see your neighbor Gunther at night, going home with a new stranger every night. He leaves for an hour, leaving music playing to drown what sounds to be screams.
As he returns, the screams and music stop, leaving you questioning where the stranger went.
After a week, the curiosity gets the best of you, you invite your friends and set off to investigate; unfortunately the door locks behind you and the music starts playing.
